identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% Gold Trading Dashboard that feels like a professional financial terminal, not a generic SaaS.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Luxury Gold aesthetics.
Emotion First: Trust, Wealth, and Alertness.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Legibility is paramount.
Zoom In: Focus on the tick-by-tick movements.
Negative Space: Use it to separate dense data clusters.

headings.usage: Page titles, Widget headers, Key metrics

data.usage: Prices, Tickers, Table data, Confidence scores

rules: Use 'border-collapse' style layouts for data grids.
Avoid rounded corners > 4px. Keep it sharp and professional.
Use 'h-full' on widgets to ensure perfect alignment.

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-black hover:bg-[#B5952F] font-bold uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-white hover:bg-secondary/80 border border-white/10 rounded-sm

charts.tooltip: Custom dark tooltip with gold borders

navigation.style: Sidebar or Topbar with 'Crystal Glass' effect if floating, or solid dark if fixed.

images.description: Abstract light trails for AI Analysis section background
Gold bullion dark background for Login or Welcome screen
Wavy lines for market trend visualization background

visual_assets.icons: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons (for more technical feel)

motion.ticker: Use react-fast-marquee for news ticker at the top

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the Gold (#D4AF37) as primary and Dark (#0A0A0A) as background.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid Mode B' for the main dashboard. It must feel dense but organized.
4. CHARTS: Implement the TradingView-style candlestick chart using Recharts. Use the specified colors.
5. AI SECTION: Use the 'Abstract light trails' image as a subtle background for the AI insights panel to give it a 'futuristic' feel.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, chart toggles).
7. NO GRADIENTS: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid dark colors or subtle noise textures.
8. BORDERS: Use 1px borders with low opacity (white/10) to define structure. Do not rely on shadows in dark mode.
universal_guidelines: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA standards).
Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Barlow Condensed'.
Make sure the 'Buy' button is Green and 'Sell' button is Red, but 'Primary' actions (like 'Analyze') are Gold.
